‚ú® We're thrilled to share the success story of our collaboration with Meesho

Meesho is renowned for its innovative approach to democratising e-commerce. One core reason behind this is the high-performing culture that every team member lives and breathes at Meesho, resulting in exceptional talent density within the organization. We are proud to have been their partners on this journey for four years and counting.

A special mention toandfor making this a focus area since Meesho's early days. This line by them captures their culture perfectly: "If Meesho was personified as an individual ‚Äî how would she behave? How would she take decisions and communicate? That, in a nutshell, is our culture."

A big thank you to the entire Meesho team,,,,,,,,,,,üôå

Sneha is an extremely grounded HR professional with practical thoughts and fantastic documentation skills. She created HR processes for us at peel-works that are still in use after 3 years and havent required any updates. She is also extremely committed as a person and you can always be sure that a deadline given by her will be honoured.
